articles.title: Gland Pharma IPO fully subscribed on final day of subscription - Mint
articles.description: Ahead of the IPO, Gland Pharma had raised  ₹1,944 crore from anchor investors.The IPO will fetch  ₹6,479.5 crore at the upper end of the price band
articles.content: The initial public offer of Gland Pharma has been fully subscribed on the final day of subscription today. The issues was subscribed 1.03 times as of 1:45 pm today. The initial public offer of Gland … [+1568 chars]
